resources.string: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat.
Your trash panda will be validated and its identity will be revealed using NFC. To conduct scanning, place your phone on the back of the raccoon.
In order to record the location of hiding, please click the button below once you have found a hiding spot. Once you click below, do not move the panda. Sit back and wait for others to discover it!
Need more time? When you are ready to hide, simply press the trash panda icon on the home screen.
